Articles.Content:
Extended cargo variant of the Czar Galactica MK 3, featuring a laundry list of improvements. Can now lift and deploy 180 tons to a 100km circular orbit and return to land safely at the KSC runway.

https://kerbalx.com/NoobTool/Czar-Galactica-Mk-3-EX

 

5 x CRG-100 MK3 cargo bays, 1 x CRG-50, 1 x CRG-25.

It can now take-off weighing 965 tons!

My intention is to fly this thing to Laythe and deploy a sizable surface outpost. The plan is to deploy stationary surface assets via precision inverted air-drop and then have them land under parachutes. Preliminary flight tests have been promising, I just have to watch the part count. Wish me luck!

 

Edited October 21, 2016 by NoobTool
